metadata.dc:author: Collazo Chao, Eliseo
metadata.dc:description: At the end of the year 2004, the Autonomous Conseil of the Medical School in Catalonia (Spain) approved its Deontology Code. The articles 33 and 59 were then judicially resorted by more than one hundred doctors in Catalonia; nowadays those articles themselves have been annulled by judicial sentence. This research aims to accomplish a valuation ethical and deontological of the annulled articles, according to the statutes.
metadata.dc:title: Valoración de los Artículos 33 y 59 del Código de Deontología de los Médicos de Cataluña (2005), Anulados Judicialmente.
[Evaluation of Articles 33 and 59, of the Code of Deontology of Doctors in Catalonia (2005), judicially annulled].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cuadernos de bioetica : revista oficial de la Asociacion Espanola de Bioetica y Etica Medica
